TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WebPartDisplayMode extends System.Object

summary.span: 为 Web 部件页可以进入的若干种显示模式定义一组公用属性。

span.span: Defines a common set of properties for the several display modes that a Web Parts page can enter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件页可以输入多种不同的显示模式。A Web Parts page can enter several different display modes. 在每个显示模式下, 将隐藏或显示 Web 部件用户界面 (UI) 的某些元素, 并启用或禁用某些类型的用户修改。In each display mode, certain elements of the Web Parts user interface (UI) are either hidden or displayed, and certain kinds of user modifications to a page are either enabled or disabled. 控件包含 Web 部件控件集中可用的显示模式的实现, 并管理页面的显示模式。The control contains the implementation for the display modes that are available in the Web Parts control set, and manages the display modes for a page. 下表列出了表示可用显示模式的字段。The following table lists fields that represent the available display modes. |显示模式Display mode|说明Description| |------------------|-----------------| ||在最终用户查看页面的正常模式下显示 Web 部件控件和 UI 元素。Displays Web Parts controls and UI elements in the normal mode in which end users view a page.| ||显示区域 UI 元素, 并使用户能够拖动 Web 部件控件以更改页面的布局。Displays zone UI elements and enables users to drag Web Parts controls to change the layout of a page.| ||显示特殊的编辑 UI 元素, 并使最终用户能够编辑页面上的控件。Displays special editing UI elements and enables end users to edit the controls on a page.| ||显示特殊的目录 UI 元素, 并使最终用户能够添加和删除页面控件。Displays special catalog UI elements and enables end users to add and remove page controls.| ||显示特殊的连接 UI 元素, 并使最终用户能够连接 Web 部件控件。Displays special connections UI elements and enables end users to connect Web Parts controls.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 Web 部件页上的显示模式的声明性用法。The following code examples demonstrate the declarative use of display modes on a Web Parts page. 每个由 Web 部件控件集实现的显示模式都是从类派生的。Each of these display modes, as implemented by the Web Parts control set, is derived from the class. 此代码示例包含四个部分:This code example has four parts: - 自定义控件。A custom control. - 一个网页, 其中包含用于承载自定义控件的区域。A Web page with a zone to host the custom control. - 使用户能够更改网页上的显示模式的用户控件。A user control that enables users to change display modes on the Web page. - 有关页面在浏览器中的工作方式的说明。An explanation of how the page works in a browser. 该示例的第一部分是自定义 `TextDisplayWebPart`控件。The first part of the example is a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`. 要使代码示例运行, 必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式编译该程序集, 并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者, 你可以将源代码放在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中, 在此文件夹中, 它将在运行时动态编译。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关这两种编译方法的演示, 请[参阅演练:开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a demonstration of both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#9)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#9)] 此代码示例的第二部分是一个网页, 该网页 ``在元素内引用标准 ASP.NET 控件, 因此该控件在运行时使用控件和给定的基本 Web 部件功能进行包装。The second part of the code example is a Web page that references a standard ASP.NET control within an `` element, so that the control is wrapped with a control and given basic Web Parts functionality at run time. 该页还引用``元素中`TextDisplayWebPart`的控件, 该控件演示最终用户切换到目录模式并向页面添加控件的能力。The page also references the `TextDisplayWebPart` control within an `` element, which demonstrates the end user's ability to switch to catalog mode and add controls to the page. 页面还包括一个``元素, 该元素使用户能够在页面处于编辑模式时编辑中包含的``控件。The page also includes an `` element, which enables users to edit the controls contained in the `` when the page is in edit mode. 页面顶部附近是`register`自定义控件和用户控件的一个指令。Near the top of the page are a `register` directive for the custom control and another one for the user control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview/CS/WebPartDisplayModecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview/VB/WebPartDisplayModevb.aspx#1)] 此代码示例的第三部分是用户控件, 该控件使用户能够在网页上切换显示模式。The third part of the code example is a user control that enables users to switch display modes on a Web page. 将此控件的源代码保存在一个名为 DisplayModeMenuCS 或 DisplayModeMenuVB 的文件中 (具体取决于用于代码示例的语言), 并将其放在与网页相同的目录中。Save the source code for this control in a file named DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx or DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx (depending on which language you use for the code example), and put it in the same directory as the Web page. 有关显示模式的详细信息以及此控件中的源代码的说明, 请参阅主题[演练:更改 Web 部件页](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)上的显示模式。For more details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see the topic [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 在浏览器中加载页面时, 可以使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件切换到不同的显示模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to different display modes. 若要编辑控件, 请在下拉列表控件中选择 "**编辑**"。To edit controls, select **Edit** in the drop-down list control. 若要编辑特定控件, 请通过单击控件标题栏中的箭头, 然后在谓词菜单中单击 "**编辑**" 来公开其谓词菜单。To edit a specific control, expose its verbs menu by clicking the arrow in the control's title bar, and then clicking **Edit** in the verbs menu. 当控件处于编辑模式时, 添加到此页的编辑控件可以更改已编辑控件的外观和布局。When a control is in edit mode, the editing controls added to this page enable you to change the edited control's appearance and layout. 完成后, 在 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件中选择 "**浏览**", 将页面返回到普通视图。When you are finished, select **Browse** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to return the page to a normal view. 若要将控件添加到页面, 请切换到目录模式。To add controls to the page, switch to catalog mode. 请注意, 可以使用 "**显示模式**" 下拉列表控件, 或单击页面底部附近的按钮。Notice that you can either use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control, or click the button near the bottom of the page. `Button1_Click`方法的内联代码演示如何以编程方式更改显示模式。The inline code for the `Button1_Click` method demonstrates how to change display modes programmatically. 在目录模式下, 可以将自定义`TextDisplayWebPart`控件添加到页面。While you are in catalog mode, you can add the custom `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page.

para.span: 开发人员可以从类派生, 以创建自定义的显示模式。

span.span: Developers can derive from the class to create custom display modes.

para.span: 若要使自定义在 Web 部件页上可用, 还需要从类派生, 并重写其方法。

span.span: To make a custom available on a Web Parts page, you would also need to derive from the class, and override its method.
Web Parts Control Set Overview

related.span: Web 部件页面显示模式

span.span: Web Parts Page Display Modes

related.span: 演练：更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式

span.span: Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

span.span: The name of the display mode.

summary.span: 为显示模式的名称初始化一个值。

span.span: Initializes a value for the name of the display mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 永远不会创建对象,因为该类是抽象类。A object is never created because the class is abstract. 在运行时, 控件使用类作为基类为每个不同的页面显示模式创建对象。At run time, the control uses the class as the base class to create objects for each of the various page display modes.

span.span: The parameter is .

para.span: 如果从类派生以创建自定义显示模式, 则必须在类声明中调用基构造函数并向其传递一个字符串, 其中包含自定义显示模式的名称。

span.span: If you derive from the class to create a custom display mode, in your class declaration you must call the base constructor and pass to it a string containing the name of the custom display mode.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property AllowPageDesign As Boolean
public: virtual property bool AllowPageDesign { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值确定当一个 Web 部件页处于某种特定显示模式时，用户是否能够更改页面布局。

span.span: Gets a value that determines whether users can change the layout of a Web Parts page when the page is in a certain display mode.

value.span: 如果用户可以更改页面布局，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if users can change the page layout; otherwise, .
The default is .
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property AssociatedWithToolZone As Boolean
public: virtual property bool AssociatedWithToolZone { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示某种显示模式是否与一个从 类中派生的类关联。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a certain display mode is associated with a class that derives from the class.

value.span: 如果显示模式与一个 类关联，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the display mode is associated with a class; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 Web 部件页面进入其属性设置为`true`的显示模式时, 该控件会将其解释为表示关联的类派生自类, 以及其他用户界面 (UI) 元素需要显示。When a Web Parts page enters a display mode whose property is set to `true`, the control interprets that to mean that an associated class derives from the class, and that additional user interface (UI) elements need to be displayed. 例如, 当页面进入编辑模式时, 将在页面上显示包含用于编辑 Web 部件控件的 UI 元素的特殊区域。For example, when a page enters edit mode, special zones that contain UI elements for editing Web Parts controls appear on the page. 此行为是可能的, 因为 字段上的属性值设置为`true`。This behavior is made possible because the property value on the field is set to `true`.

para.span: 从基类派生的用于创建自定义显示模式的类必须重写属性才能设置其值。

span.span: Classes that derive from the base class to create custom display modes must override the property in order to set its value.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls
